metadata.title: CVE-2021-27025 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was discovered in Puppet Agent where the agent may silently ignoreAugeas settings or may be vulnerable to a Denial of Service condition priorto the first 'pluginsync'.

criterions.comment: puppet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
